creator: david.bleeker@experian.com
text:
The <war> task produces a "web-inf/web.xml" file in the output war. This should 
be "WEB-INF/web.xml" (note case). I have seen messages on the newsgroups 
confirming that this is an issue for other Ant users also. I am running Win2K 
using the 7/9/2002 build of Ant 1.5. I have confirmed that this behavior also 
exists for Ant 1.3.

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
How have you confirmed this? Did you use WinZIp, perhaps? Have you considered
the possibility that the problem lies not in Ant but in WinZip?

Try 
jar tvf warfile.war

to see the real contents of your war.
